author: Richard W Hamming
title: The Art of Doing Science and Engineering

notes.content: This is one of my favorite books ever! I strongly recommend you read this book!

This is where I first discover the print edition I own is rather different from the digital copy I found.
"Training is how to do it." Does that mean coder bootcamps are a perfectly fine idea? Does this already imply the idea of blue collar coding? Would white collar coding be the "what, when, and why to do things" ?
